name: albion-bm-prices-overview
description: Albion black market offer city prices overview application

scripts.start: cd frontend && npm run -- build --prod --deployUrl=`pwd`/dist/albion-bm-prices-overview/ && cd .. && electron .
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run -- build --prod --deployUrl=/frontend/ && cd .. && electron-builder build -wlm

author: Ruslan Gataullin <ruslan@solid.studio>
